body_content.explanation: to wait or move in a secret way so that you cannot be seen, especially because you are about to attack someone or do something wrong:
examples: Someone was lurking in the shadows.
Why are you lurking around in the hallway?

body_content.explanation: (of an unpleasant feeling or quality) to exist although it is not always noticeable:
examples: It seems that old prejudices are still lurking beneath the surface.

body_content.explanation: to spend time in a chat room or on a social media website and read what other people have posted (= written or added) without posting anything yourself
